Call, email or submit an inquiry today to learn more! Job Listings Job Listings - We're hiring! Call, email or submit an inquiry today to learn more! navigation logo 1243 Harbor View Road, Charleston, SC 29412 map marker pin About us Casual camp-like setting with indoor bar and outdoor seating overlooking the marsh and Ellis Creek. Come on by 7 days a week 11:00am - 9:00pm No reservations. Please order from the window located street side or the front of the building. Orders are placed, you receive your beverages, find a seat inside or out and we bring your food and any additional items to you. Bring your best dog friend with you! Read more about us PrivateParties HOST YOURPRIVATE PARTIESWITH US! Parties book a party Catering Let us cater your next event Catering Specials Your Dog Wants to Come to Ellis Creek Too! Homemade Turkey Dinner 11:00 AM - 09:00 PM ALL SPECIALS Events Easter Sunday April 5th Come celebrate Easter with us! Reviews review by - Yelp Mark S: This was our first time here and it was amazing. We enjoyed the jalapeño Moscow mules, catfish bites, fried okra, and the entrees. Service was excellent and he (sad I forgot his name) was very personable. Definitely would come back when we are in town!!!!! review by - Yelp Charisse F: I love the service including the beautiful outside dining areas. The customer service from the hostess, cooks, servers/ waiter was truly delightful. The rustic fish camp decor only adds to rich flavor of the local crafted beer and local ingredients... review by - Yelp Liz M: Ellis Creek Fish Camp is a really cool seafood restaurant that has beautiful views of the water. I like the outdoor eating option and it is good to get some fresh air and a breeze while eating. I like the hushpuppies and fish options on the menu the best... review by - Yelp B C: The best fried okra I've ever had!!! The grouper sandwich was perfectly cooked...not over done, hot and flaked apart the way perfectly cooked fish should! Beautiful marsh setting. Friendly attentive service...Great spot for an awesome low country meal. review by - Yelp Dave C: First time here, and it was OUTSTANDING!! Service was superb, food was delicious, atmosphere was kickin, and I even loved the music playing. Will be back, and will tell all my friends to come. You just made a new fan!! Stop reviews carousel Play reviews carousel Newsletter Location 1243 Harbor View Road Charleston, SC 29412 Visit our sister restaurants Hours Seven Days a Week 11:00am-8:00pm Find us on... Specials And Events Sunday January 18th Ellis Creek Fish Camp is serving lunch and dinner, 11:00am-9:00pm, daily. Customers are directed to go to the OUTSIDE WINDOW, located at the front of the building . Order from the the window and sit at a clean table with your caddy, silverware & beverage. We will bring your food and anything else you need to compliment your meals. Please limit your footprint ie: do not litter, be considerate, etc. 11:00 AM - 09:00 PM Your Dog Wants to Come to Ellis Creek Too!
